classes.cCustomNote: Any Free Elective course can go here. Recommended: BUS100.

One course from each of the following GE areas must be completed: A1, A2, A3, B1, B2, Upper-Division B, C1, C2, Lower-Division C Elective, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, Lower-Division E, F, and GE Electives (8). Upper-Division B, Upper-Division C, and Upper-Division D should be taken only after Junior standing is reached (90 units). Refer to online catalog for GE course selection, United States Cultural Pluralism (USCP) and Graduation Writing Requirement (GWR). USCP requirement can be satisfied by some (but not all) courses within GE categories: Upper-Division B, C1, Upper-Division C, D1, Upper-Division D, or E.

Any ECON Elective (400 level) course can go here.

Choose one of the following: BUS391, ECON395, or CSC101.

Students who take BUS391 (4 units) must also take BUS392 (4 units). Choosing BUS391 & BUS392 will reduce Free Electives to 4 units (vs 8). Students may also take ECON395 or CSC101, and a Free Elective instead of BUS391 & BUS392.
